s.text: "So I want to start by telling you what we were doing in that Washington bunker.
Since then, though, the heroes-in-the-gallery gambit has gotten completely out of hand, turning the State of the Union address into a version of the Grammys for people who can't sing.
To be sure, Gore was demagogic, gimmicky, and condescending at times--he can't help it.
As he put a question about agriculture to Bradley, Gore asked a member of the audience named Chris Peterson to stand.
